rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKC1200, MKC2200, MKF1120, MKP1120} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: An overview of retailing from a management perspective. The development of retailing; the Australian retail industry and its environment; merchandising planning, control and distribution; pricing merchandise; selling and sales promotion; store location, layout and presentation.
